references.paper_title: Qwen-vl: A frontier large vision-language model with versatile abilities.
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces Qwen-VL, a key large vision-language model used as a foundation in the DREAM ENGINE architecture, making it fundamental to the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis.
references.reason: This work is crucial because it details the Stable Diffusion 3 model that DREAM ENGINE builds upon, with it being essential for generating high-resolution images.
This paper describes visual instruction tuning, which is an important method to ensure the alignment of representations in text to image models which dream engine is based on.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision.
references.reason: This paper is relevant as it discusses CLIP, a model that provides unified representational space that is essential for coherent text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper presents Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), and details their application in DREAM ENGINE, it is the fundamental technology used for manipulating the latent space for image generation.
